title: HCP Portal
description: A global pharmaceutical leader, faced challenges in developing and scaling their HCP portal to meet the needs of 40+ countries while maintaining cost efficiency and high performance.
challenges: High costs for deploying country-specific portals, averaging $50K+ per rollout.
Complex integrations across diverse systems to support global operations.
The need for improved web accessibility and SEO performance to ensure compliance and visibility.
Inefficiencies in cloud migration and data handling processes, risking delays and operational overhead.

milestones.title: Successfully launched the HCP Portal (Version 1.0) from POC in less than 6 months
Deployed the HCP portal across 40+ countries, ensuring global access for healthcare professionals
Implemented 15+ complex integrations, including PIAP, ICC, LMS, Coveo, On24, AWS S3, Veeva Vault, Kafka, MuleSoft, Google Analytics, and more
Completed AMS on prem to AEM Cloud migration within 3 months, transferring 110+ GB of critical content
Reduced portal launch costs from $50K to $5K per country, achieving a 90% cost savings
Maintained a consistent 90+ SEO and Web Accessibility score, ensuring compliance and increased engagement
Consolidated 80+ domains in 3 months, ensuring robust and unified global operations
Trained 400+ HCP content authors globally, promoting collaboration and CMS knowledge sharing

title: Multi-Regional Digital Experience
description: A biotechnology company focused on the discovery, development, and commercialization of innovative medicines. Their HCP Portal provides verified healthcare professionals with secure access to clinical data, prescribing information, and research updates to support informed patient care.
challenges: Commercialization market in 5 new European countries.
They need product websites for different countries.
They need a central digital HCP portal to enable multi-channel capabilities for the commercial business units in five European countries.

milestones.title: Functional & Layout Design‚Äã

Customer Data Platform including Consent management‚Äã
Automated content approval workflows for pharma compliance‚Äã
All AEM components with responsive design‚Äã

title: Streamlined Digital Experience‚Äã
description: A global leader in broadband, mobile, and IT services, providing businesses with cutting-edge communication solutions. We helped BT overcome the challenge of lacking a B2B customer-facing site by developing an online platform that enabled seamless order placement for customers, enhancing their digital experience and improving service accessibility.
challenges: Ability to make online order placement for customers was required.

milestones.title: B2B Customer facing website and self-service portal
Online order journey management with integrations to backend fulfillment systems
Generated ¬£50M pounds of order volume each year

title: B2B Product Catalogs & Ecommerce
description: A global leader in precision measurement solutions. We optimized their B2B Product Catalog & eCommerce with fast search across 50k+ pages, seamless integration with PCM, Typesense, Redis, and CIAM, and the ability to handle 20k+ visitors in 24 hours. We also developed dynamic product pages that load instantly, ensuring a seamless user experience.
challenges: Fast and accurate search on a very large amount of content where there are currently 50k+ pages.
Efficiently handle many unique visitors 20k+ in just 24 hours.
Integration with different systems like PCM, Typesense, Redis, CIAM, etc.
Build product pages dynamically on the fly in a minimum amount of time that it looks like data being fetched from native.

milestones.title: Integrated Typesense, Redis, and Scrapy for real-time search
Advanced search on large volume of contents & data
Integrated Tailwind to have a robust front-end performance
Dynamic integration with PCM / SAP Hybris commerce platform
